events.description: A scheduled swap by the Reserve Bank of India to influence liquidity and trading activity.
A trade agreement reducing US tariffs on Indian goods from 50% to 18%.
The expected maintenance of the repo rate at 5.25% following previous cuts.

facts.fact_text: The Indian rupee was valued at approximately 90.5 per dollar.

evidences.evidence_text: The Indian rupee edged lower to around 90.5 per dollar

facts.fact_text: The US-India trade deal reduces tariffs on Indian goods from 50% to 18%.

evidences.evidence_text: reduces US tariffs on Indian goods from 50% to 18%

facts.fact_text: The RBI implemented 125 basis points of rate cuts in 2025.

claims.claim_text: Corporates increased dollar purchases to hedge against import costs and overseas obligations.

evidences.evidence_text: Corporates stepped up dollar purchases to hedge import costs and other overseas obligations.

claims.claim_text: The RBI swap is expected to influence market liquidity and trading activity.
claims.author: investors

evidences.evidence_text: which could influence liquidity and trading activity.

claims.claim_text: The trade deal is expected to support exports in textiles, apparel, and industrial goods.
claims.author: Analysts

evidences.evidence_text: Analysts note the deal supports exports in textiles, apparel, and industrial goods

claims.claim_text: India's trade deficit might restrict the immediate appreciation of the rupee.
claims.author: Analysts

evidences.evidence_text: though India’s trade deficit may limit immediate rupee gains.

claims.claim_text: The RBI is expected to keep the repo rate steady at 5.25%.

evidences.evidence_text: The RBI is expected to maintain its policy repo rate at 5.25%

evidence.evidence_text: investors monitored the Reserve Bank of India’s $10 billion 3-year dollar-rupee swap... which could influence liquidity
the deal supports exports in textiles, apparel, and industrial goods
India’s trade deficit may limit immediate rupee gains.
Indian rupee edged lower... amid corporate dollar buying
